Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Waterfront Way, north of the Grainery and Silos.
Room.LongDescription: The large Grainery and equally impressive silos on the south side of the road store the year's crops for the devastating winter months. Although Oceancrest is close to the ocean, winter months can bring on some snow. Nevertheless, it gets quite cold out and crops just don't grow when the water doesn't even flow.
